sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <el-form ref="checkInForm" :model="checkInForm" label-width="80px">
    <el-form-item label="入住人">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.checkname" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="联系电话">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.checkphone" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="身份证号">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.checkidcard" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="客房类型">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.typeid" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="入住时间">
      <el-col :span="11">
        <el-date-picker
          v-model="checkInForm.arriretime"
          type="datetime"
          placeholder="选择日期"
          style="width: 100%;"
          default-time="12:00:00"
          format="yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
          value-format="yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
        />
      </el-col>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="退房时间">
      <el-col :span="11">
        <el-date-picker
          v-model="checkInForm.leavetime"
          type="datetime"
          placeholder="选择日期"
          style="width: 100%;"
          default-time="12:00:00"
          format="yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
          value-format="yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
        />
      </el-col>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="单据状态">
      <el-checkbox-group v-model="checkInForm.checkstate">
        <el-checkbox label="未办理入住" />
        <el-checkbox label="已办理入住" />
      </el-checkbox-group>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="入住人数">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.checknum" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="客房编号">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.roomid" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="客房价格">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.price" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="入住价格">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.checkprice" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="折扣">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.discount" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="折扣原因">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.discountreason" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="备注">
      <el-input v-model="checkInForm.remark" />
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="是否结账">
      <el-checkbox-group v-model="checkInForm.ischeck">
        <el-checkbox label="是" />
        <el-checkbox label="否" />
      </el-checkbox-group>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item>
      <el-button type="primary" @click="onSubmit">立即创建</el-button>
      <el-button>取消</el-button>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>
<script>
import { checkIn } from '@/api/checkin'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      checkInForm: {
        checkname: '',
        checkphone: '',
        checkidcard: '',
        typeid: this.$route.params.typeid,
        arriretime: '',
        leavetime: '',
        checkstate: '',
        checknum: '',
        roomid: this.$route.params.roomid,
        price: '',
        checkprice: '',
        discount: '',
        discountreason: '',
        ischeck: '',
        remark: '',
        operatorid: this.$store.getters.id
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSumbit() {
      console.log(this.$store.getters.id)
      checkIn(this.checkInForm).then(res => {
        this.$notify({
          title: res.data.data,
          type: 'success'
        })
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="">

</style>
